text:
Company Background:
Lester, Bennett and Wilkins is a leading law firm specializing in corporate contracts and consulting. We are dedicated to creating inclusive and equitable work environments where all employees can thrive.

Job Type:
Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking an IT Contract Analyst to join our growing team. This role involves reviewing, drafting, and negotiating IT contracts, ensuring compliance with legal requirements, and supporting our clients in achieving their business objectives.

Responsibilities:
- Analyze and review IT contracts, identifying potential risks and compliance issues.
- Draft and negotiate terms and conditions for a variety of IT agreements.
- Maintain up-to-date knowledge of relevant laws and regulations.
- Collaborate with internal teams and clients to ensure contract terms meet business needs.
- Provide guidance on contract management and best practices.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor’s degree in Law, Business, or a related field.
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in contract analysis or a similar role.
- Excellent understanding of IT contracts and relevant legal requirements.
- Strong analytical and negotiation skills.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary range: $60,000 to $80,000, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health and dental benefits.
- Paid time off and flexible working hours.
- Professional development opportunities.
- A supportive and inclusive work environment.

Diversity Statement:
As part of our diversity initiatives, we seek to amplify queer voices within our team. We strive to build a workforce that reflects the diversity of the LGBTQ+ community and are committed to building a workforce that celebrates and supports queer identities.
